getPrices(address,address).details: get prices of a token pair

getRatios(address,address).details: get ratios of a token pair

params._ratio01: ratio of token0: The amount of tokens _token0 in the pool (token0, token1)
params._ratio10: ratio of token1: The amount of tokens _token1 in the pool (token0, token1)

getReserve(address).details: get revserve of a token pair

params._reserve: the total liquidity of _token in the APM

updaReserveAfterAddingLiquidity(address,.details: update revserve of tokens after adding liquidity

params._amount: amount of the tokens to add

updaReserveAfterRemovingLiquidity(addres.details: update revserve of tokens after removing liquidity

params._amount: amount of the tokens to add

updateRatioAfterAddingLiquidity(address,.details: update rations of a token pair

params._amount0: amount of first tokens to add
params._amount1: amount of second tokens to add

updateRatioAfterRemovingLiquidity(addres.details: update rations of a token pair after removing liquidity

params._amount0: amount of first tokens to add
params._amount1: amount of second tokens to add
